post.body: I use Bloglines. Works pretty well, though maybe not for the mp3 part.
nice meeting you on tues. night!
I know people who know people. Where's your list?

Stuff I saw in NY: snow, rain, coworkers, booze and very little sleep.

Getting ready to head to NYC for a couple days. Flight delayed. Not a good start.
